This is an [R Markdown website](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/rmarkdown_websites.html). The source can be found [on GitHub](https://github.com/jennybc/purrr-tutorial) and its home on the web is here:

<https://jennybc.github.io/purrr-tutorial>

Who am I?

  * Jenny Bryan

Materials initially created to support:

  * [2016-08-12 meeting](https://github.com/minisciencegirl/studyGroup/issues/131) of the Vancouver R Study Group.  
  * [STAT 545](http://stat545.com) Exploratory Data Analysis
  * [DSCI 523](http://www.calendar.ubc.ca/vancouver/courses.cfm?page=code&code=DSCI) Data Wrangling, part of the UBC Master of Data Science

Versions of key packages:

```{r}

```
